verses.verse: When <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> he <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H6213>men,<s%> who were warriors, to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H7725>bring<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam.<s%>
But the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>"Speak<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "You shall not go <S%H5927>up,<s%> nor <S%H3898>fight<s%> against your <S%H251>brothers!<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house;<s%> for this <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H1961>of<s%> <S%H8085>me.<s%>"'" So they listened to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H3212>going<s%> against <S%H3379>Jeroboam.<s%>
<S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for <S%H4692>defense<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> and <S%H5862>Etam,<s%> and <S%H8620>Tekoa,<s%>
Beth <S%H1049>Zur,<s%> and <S%H7755>Soco,<s%> and <S%H5725>Adullam,<s%>
and <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and <S%H4762>Mareshah,<s%> and <S%H2128>Ziph,<s%>
and <S%H115>Adoraim,<s%> and <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%>
and <S%H6881>Zorah,<s%> and <S%H357>Aijalon,<s%> and <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> which are in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H4694>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
He <S%H2388>fortified<s%> the <S%H4694>strongholds,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5057>captains<s%> in <S%H214>them,<s%> and stores of <S%H3978>food,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H3196>wine.<s%>
He put <S%H6793>shields<s%> and <S%H7420>spears<s%> in every <S%H5892>city,<s%> and made them <S%H7235>exceeding<s%> <S%H2388>strong.<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and Benjamin belonged to <S%H1144>him.<s%>
The <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who were in all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3320>resorted<s%> to him out of all their <S%H1366>border.<s%>

For the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> and their <S%H272>possession,<s%> and <S%H3212>came<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> for <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> cast them <S%H2186>off,<s%> that they should not execute the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>
and he <S%H5975>appointed<s%> him <S%H3548>priests<s%> for the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and for the male <S%H8163>goats,<s%> and for the <S%H5695>calves<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H7626>them,<s%> out of all the tribes of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> such as <S%H5414>set<s%> their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

So they <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and made <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H553>strong,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> for they <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

<S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him a <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H4258>Mahalath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3406>Jerimoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and of <S%H32>Abihail<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse;<s%>
and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> and <S%H8114>Shemariah,<s%> and <S%H2093>Zaham.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> her he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H53>Absalom;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H29>Abijah,<s%> and <S%H6262>Attai,<s%> and <S%H2124>Ziza,<s%> and <S%H8019>Shelomith.<s%>

<S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H53>Absalom<s%> above all his <S%H802>wives<s%> and his <S%H6370>concubines:<s%> (for he <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> and <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H6370>concubines,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>)

<S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H29>Abijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> to be <S%H7218>chief,<s%> the <S%H5057>prince<s%> among his <S%H251>brothers;<s%> for he intended to make him <S%H4427>king.<s%>

He dealt <S%H995>wisely,<s%> and <S%H6555>dispersed<s%> of all his <S%H1121>sons<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>lands<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> to every <S%H4694>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city:<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4202>food<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance.<s%> He <S%H7592>sought<s%> for them <S%H1995>many<s%> <S%H802>wives.<s%>
